title.bibl: Lietuva, Vol. VII, No. 17, April 28, 1899. Mass Meeting

div.bibl: Lietuva, Vol. VII, No. 17, April 28, 1899. MASS MEETING

body.p: The members of the societies of St. Casimir, the Providence of God, St. John the Baptist, Simonas Daukantas, the King David, and St. Paul and Peter, must come to the meeting, Laudanskas Hall, 3301 S. Morgan St. The meeting will start at 8:30 P.M. This meeting is very important. We have a reply from the bishop. You have heard that there will be a parish meeting in the church hall this coming Sunday. If such meeting is held, we must be at this meeting in the church hall.
